models

Class SVCDB

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
      • models.SVCDB
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class SVCDB
extends android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
    This is the helper class of the SQLite DB.
    It contains CRUD operations on the DB tables, and everything related to the DB.

        Parameters:

      • getUserVisitCards

        public java.util.ArrayList<VisitCardDTO> getUserVisitCards(java.lang.String userEmail)
        Gets a list of all the visit cards owned by the given user.
        Parameters:
        userEmail - The email of the user owning the visit cards.
        Returns:
        The visit cards owned by the user (empty list if user owns none).
